mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password, name, nickname, phone, profile_image, bio, role, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{profileImage}, #{bio}, #{role}, #{isActive}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, phone = #{phone}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, bio = #{bio}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE users SET is_active = false WHERE user_id = #{userId}
